Always hide the dock and reveal it when.Always hide the dock and reveal it when: 总是隐藏程序坞，并在靠近它时显露

Always show a minimum of 3 workspaces, e.Always show a minimum of 3 workspaces, e: 即使不足也总是显示至少三个工作区

Always show when there's only one connec.Always show when there's only one connec: 当仅连接一个显示器时，总是显示

Apply warm color temperature to reduce e.Apply warm color temperature to reduce e: 应用暖色温以减轻眼睛疲劳，可通过下方设置配置按时间自动启用。

Apps are ordered by usage frequency, the.Apps are ordered by usage frequency, the: 应用按使用频率、最近使用时间和字母顺序排序。

Apps with custom display name, icon, or.Apps with custom display name, icon, or: 程序会带有自定义名称、图标与启动选项。右键应用并选择“编辑应用”进行自定义。

Automatically delete entries older than.Automatically delete entries older than: 自动删除比这更旧的项目

Show only apps running in current worksp.Show only apps running in current worksp: 仅显示当前工作区中的活动应用

Show only workspaces belonging to each s.Show only workspaces belonging to each s: 仅显示属于各个显示器的工作区。

Show weather information in top bar and.Show weather information in top bar and: 在顶栏和控制中心显示天气信息

Show workspace index numbers in the top.Show workspace index numbers in the top: 在顶栏工作区切换器中显示工作区索引号

Show workspace name on horizontal bars,.Show workspace name on horizontal bars,: 在水平状态栏上显示工作区名称，而在垂直状态栏上显示首字母。

Show workspaces of the currently focused.Show workspaces of the currently focused: 显示当前聚焦显示器的工作区

Shows all running applications with focu.Shows all running applications with focu: 显示所有正在运行应用程序，并标记焦点所在

Shows current workspace and allows switc.Shows current workspace and allows switc: 显示当前工作区并支持快速切换

Shows when microphone, camera, or screen.Shows when microphone, camera, or screen: 显示麦克风、摄像头或屏幕共享的使用状态

The DMS_SOCKET environment variable is n.The DMS_SOCKET environment variable is n: 未设置 DMS_SOCKET 环境变量或套接字不可用，无法使用自动插件管理。

The below settings will modify your GTK.The below settings will modify your GTK: 以下设置将修改您的 GTK 和 Qt 配置。如需保留当前配置，请先备份 (qt5ct.conf|qt6ct.conf 和 ~/.config/gtk-3.0|gtk-4.0)。

Third-party plugins are created by the c.Third-party plugins are created by the c: 第三方插件由社区开发，DankMaterialShell 不提供官方支持。\n\n这些插件可能存在隐私和安全隐患，请自行承担风险。

This bind is overridden by config.kdl.This bind is overridden by config.kdl: 此绑定已被 config.kdl 覆盖

This widget prevents GPU power off state.This widget prevents GPU power off state: 此部件会阻止 GPU 进入省电状态，可能会显著影响笔记本的电池续航。不建议在配备混合显卡的笔记本上使用。

This will delete all unpinned entries. %.This will delete all unpinned entries. %: 此操作将删除所有已取消固定的项目。%1个已固定项目将被保留。

This will permanently delete all clipboa.This will permanently delete all clipboa: 此操作会清空剪贴板历史，且无法恢复。

This will permanently remove this saved.This will permanently remove this saved: 此操作会永久移除已保存的剪贴板项目。此操作将无法撤销。

Timeout for normal priority notification.Timeout for normal priority notification: 普通优先级通知的超时时间

Use animated wave progress bars for medi.Use animated wave progress bars for medi: 进行媒体播放时显示动画波形进度条

Use custom border/focus-ring width.Use custom border/focus-ring width: 使用自定义边框/焦点环宽度

Use custom gaps instead of bar spacing.Use custom gaps instead of bar spacing: 使用自定义间隔替代状态栏空隙

Use custom window rounding instead of th.Use custom window rounding instead of th: 使用自定义窗口圆角代替主题半径

Use fingerprint reader for lock screen a.Use fingerprint reader for lock screen a: 使用指纹识别进行锁屏验证（需要录入指纹）

Use light theme instead of dark theme.Use light theme instead of dark theme: 使用浅色主题替代深色主题

Use sound theme from system settings.Use sound theme from system settings: 使用系统设置中的声音主题

Use the same position and size on all di.Use the same position and size on all di: 在所有显示器上使用同样的位置与大小

Used when accent color is set to Custom.Used when accent color is set to Custom: 当强调色为自定义时使用

Uses sunrise/sunset times to automatical.Uses sunrise/sunset times to automatical: 使用所在位置的日出/日落时间，自动调节夜间模式。

VRR activates only when applications req.VRR activates only when applications req: 只有当应用程序请求时，VRR才会被激活

Variant created - expand to configure.Variant created - expand to configure: 已创建变体 - 展开以配置

When enabled, apps are sorted alphabetic.When enabled, apps are sorted alphabetic: 启用后，应用按字母顺序排序；禁用则按使用频率排序
